name: HaloQuotes
0:
”Alexa open Halo Quotes”
”Alexa, ask Halo Quotes for a Master Chief quote”
”Alexa, tell Halo Quotes to start trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halo quotes
des: Unofficial quote generator with quotes from characters in the Halo video game series. This skill can retrieve any of the programmed quotes, a character specific programmed quote, or start a game of trivia that presents 10 quotes, asking the user to respond with a character's name.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
